body.p: Creates a readable external table, ext_expenses, using the gpfdist protocol. The files are formatted with a pipe (|) as the column delimiter.=# CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_expenses ( name text, date date, amount float4, category text, desc1 text ) LOCATION ('gpfdist://etlhost-1:8081/*') FORMAT 'TEXT' (DELIMITER '|');
